name: Give and Take (Noodlebox)
description:
We ran very close to the wall on this one, not finished but, still have some fun shooting bad guys, slapping elves and present mines chain exploding.

"Protect your sleigh from the baddies looking to ruin Christmas, deliver presents to the locals in return for powerful gifts and defend your contracted elf's to finish making presents."

uploaded a version 2 not for jam but anyone who wanted to see a version that in my opinion is somewhat playable.
